message: Let's start with a fair split. Accept and we can end the game early!
You're starting high, I'm going to try to negotiate
Meet me in the middle, Bob! Let's make a deal!
You're getting closer, but I'm not there yet
Getting closer to the middle, Bob! Let's make a deal!
I'm not backing down, Alice. You're getting closer to my number

Fine, we'll meet in the middle. But I'm not happy about it
